{{ $('Create payment link').item.json.url }}

Participant list:
{{ $('Config').item.json.sheet_url }}#gid={{ $('Create Stripe Product').item.json.created }}

Zoom infos:
Link: {{ $('Create Zoom meeting').item.json.join_url }}

parameters.message:
=Dear {{ $('On payment').item.json.data.object.customer_details.name }},

We are very happy to announce that your subscription to our event {{ $json.title }} starting on {{ $json.start }} is now confirmed.

Here are the infos you will need to participate:
Zoom link: {{ $('On payment').item.json.data.object.metadata.zoom_link }}
Zoom password:{{ $('On payment').item.json.data.object.metadata.zoom_password }}
Zoom ID: {{ $('On payment').item.json.data.object.metadata.zoom_id }}

Looking forward to see you there!
Kind regards
parameters.subject: Than you for your subscription 🙏

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Streamline Your Zoom Meetings with Secure, Automated Stripe Payments

## Overview
Automated workflow: Streamline Your Zoom Meetings with Secure, Automated Stripe Payments. This workflow integrates 11 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, formTrigger, noOp, set. It contains 27 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 27
- **Node Types**: 11
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Create Zoom meeting**: zoom
- **Create Stripe Product**: httpRequest
- **Config**: set
- **Send email to teacher**: gmail
- **Create participant list**: googleSheets
- **Add participant to list**: googleSheets
- **Send confirmation to participant**: gmail
- **Notify teacher**: gmail
- **Create payment link**: httpRequest
- **Format participant**: set
- ... and 17 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
